tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very good experience. Best consultation. Recommend this dentist. Very friendly and ensures the treatment is good and safe.

I am suffering with teeth pain. Something was struck in the molars. I have clearly told Dr. there is something between teeth its not coming am trying since two days. She checked she said nothing is there. That teeth was spoiled need to remove or else it will effect rest of the teeth and she asked me to go for x-ray. I cam to office am feeling uneasy because of that. I tried for 30 min with safety pin finally i pulled it out. So please take care before going there. One more point even equipment lights are not working she checked like that only. Torch also didn't worked. This will show how they are maintaining.

review: Being the first time, my experience can not be compared with any other dental care institution/ doctor. However the way the doctors made me comfortable during the procedure was very good. Doctors explained me what, why the problem arose & how it is being addressed for the future. Every patient needs to know this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Happy with the treatment I got and queries clarified. Doctor and all other members are very nice, cooperative, friendly and well behave. From last 6 years I'm going there and feel happy. A special thanks to doctor and all members also for my treatment and taking care. May your clinic grow bigger and bigger day-by-day. Have a good time.
It was a good experience thtough this treatment.   The process ws deeply explained .The treatment was satisfaction

I came to this clinic after visiting several other hospitals. Got my lower dentures elsewhere which were useless and wasn't wearing them. But Dr subramoniam and Dr suganya encouraged me to use the old dentures and made necessary corrections and repairs. Since I was very happy with there services I decided to place implants for the upper jaw and now got implant supported dentures . I thank Dr suganya who handled my dental problems **** ***** ***** *** *********

Doctors explained the Patient about the actual problem and were spared  enough time to answer all the questions raised. One improvement can be thought of is to waive of the service charges for the credit card, so that the payment can be simplified rather encouraging cash payment.â˜º

Doctor was very friendly to me during the treatments. The Doctor explained my problem very patiently to me. Because I can't understand some technical terms. Now my treatment is over and I feel better, thanks Doctor. I recommended this Doctor to my friend also.
I am not feeling pain and good care. l feel comfortable to call her any time if I feel pain. For regular patient, the treatment cost can be reduced.

review: I asked  about  the root canal treatment to him. He clearly explained what has to be done for me. Now I am free from the sensitivity. I am starting recommendations to my relatives.

Treatment is so good. And the cost for the treatment also reasonable. Brief explanation is given for the cause of the problem. Very gentle. Doctor is so friendly. Good hospital for our teeth to get protected. And it is guaranteed too.

Feels very comfortable. Clear explanation about the problem and their solutions brings in confidence of coming out of the ailment.made myself committed to visit the clinic again after six months as advised by the dentist .

I had come four years back for teeth removal now again I had a similar problem on the right side for which got my wisdom tooth removed.The Doctor removed wisdom tooth without any pain and charges are very affordable to me.

I came here through a reference from a friend of mine. The dr is Very Good and kind enough .excellent job done to my satisfaction.will bring my children for braces in the future.
